Package net.datacrow.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IStarterClient
    The starter client is used to listen for events from the DcStarter class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientSettings
    The client settings contains the selected user directory for this client.
    DcConfig
    Data Crow Configuration.
    DcRepository
    Holder of definitions such as setting keys and static collections.
    DcRepository.Collections
    Contains collections which can be used throughout the application.
    DcRepository.Database
    The supported database value types.
    DcRepository.ExternalReferences
    The External reference keys as used to store external references.
    DcRepository.ModuleSettings
    The keys for module specific settings.
    DcRepository.Settings
    The keys for application level settings.
    DcRepository.ValueTypes
    The supported value types.
    DcStarter
    The DcStarter class holds the generic startup routine for Data Crow and is used by the application server and the client version of Data Crow.
    DcThread
    Extended Thread class.
    IconLibrary
    Holder of all icons.
    Platform
    Describes the platform on which Data Crow is running.
    UserMode
    The user mode determines which actions are available to the user.
    Version
    A version definition.
